issue.title: Use organism categories in SERVICE PROXY access scopes
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

In feature #642 (Add categories for organism) it has been accepted (PSC) that the organism categories should be used wherever possible in easySDI.

One of the missing elements is now the access scopes on virtual services (access rules).

We propose to make that change 

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
